thread.title: Norwegian Cruise Line appoints European MD
thread.title_full: Norwegian Cruise Line appoints European MD

title: Norwegian Cruise Line appoints European MD
text:
Norwegian Cruise Line appoints European MD 30 June 2015 Save 
Norwegian Cruise Line has appointed Christian Boell as European managing director. 
Boell, who previously worked for German river cruise brand nicko, will be based in Germany and will also lead Norwegian’s team at its new Southampton office. 
He will report to Francis Riley, the cruise line’s senior vice president international sales and operations. 
Riley called Boell a “well-respected and talented marketer with a wealth of experience and a true cruise enthusiast”. 
“His extensive industry know-how will play a vital role in better positioning the Norwegian Cruise Line brand and our innovative Freestyle Cruising concept in our European key markets,” said Riley. 
Boell was also involved in the launch and expansion of German cruise lines Aida and Arosa.
